body: Αἴξ, goat, male and female, Ibex or wild goat, _Spratt's Lycia_, Caper hircus, _Strack_, 13, 27, 28, 31, 66; the she goats of Œta, 70; the he goat in Lemnos, _ib._; it is mentioned with the chimæra or domestic goat in 71; dreams, 97; infested with ticks, 134; discharges of the female, 163, 164; gestation, 165; food, drink, &c., 207; the wild goat, 225; Syrian Caper hircus Mambricus and Lycian goat, C. Angorensis, _ib._; Egyptian, 226; its mode of life, 235; wild goats in Crete, 238; rumination, 278.
